column3: recommended this place and it did not disappoint. This place is Mmmm Mmmmm good! My favorite? The pork sandwich. Ask for the Memphis sauce. This is the more "BBQ-y" of the two sauces. The other is more of a vinegar base and lacks that tangy BBQ flavor. Â The mac n' cheese and peach cobbler make for delicious sides. My friend
column5: loves the ribs. I have yet to try them as they are a bit messy to eat. I guess I can be a BBQ prima donna that way! lol Smoque is closed on Mondays
column7: it's a fantastic place worth checking out
